Summary: Biochemical reaction from propranolol to n-desisopropylpropranolol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from propranolol to propranolol glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A9, UGT1A10, UGT2B7 or UGT2B4.
Biochemical reaction from propranolol to 4-hydroxypropranolol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from 4-hydroxypropranolol to 4-hydroxypropranolol sulfate. This interaction is catalyzed by SULT1A3.
Biochemical reaction from n-desisopropylpropranolol to naphthoxylactic acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by MAOA or ALDH2.
